text: Is it possible to manage deals on two separate pipelines using Ecom Bridge API?

When you create a Store, according to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/ecomm-bridge/v2/ecommerce-bridge-overview>, a pipeline called "Ecommerce Pipeline" is created. It seems like no matter what Store you use, Deals end up associated with "Ecommerce Pipeline" - so I guess my question is, can you have two Ecommerce Pipelines, identified by pipeline_id in the Sync Message properties?

I think no for now <@U7QHZR9DZ>, the `ecommerce pipelines` is not associated with stores and you can not modify that, what you can do is if you want you can create another deal pipeline, and at the time of creating deal you can assign the deal pipeline.
Ah thatâ€™s a really interesting idea, thanks <@UCH1L597V> :pray::skin-tone-2:
